Description: THE PURPOSE OF THIS AGREEMENT IS TO REIMBURSE WORK COMPLETED UNDER AGREEMENT R08AC60001. UNDER AGREEMENT R08AC60001, THE RECIPIENT EXPENDED  102,211,112.85. THE AUTHORIZING LEGISLATION REQUIRES A 75  COST SHARE ON THE PART OF THE RECIPIENT  25  COST SHARE IS REQUIRED BY THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT. THE TOTAL FEDERAL COST SHARE AUTHORIZED FOR REIMBURSEMENT IS  25,552,778.21.RECLAMATION REIMBURSED THE RECIPIENT A TOTAL OF  4,323,267.29 UNDER THE AGREEMENT R08AC60001. THE TOTAL UNREIMBURSED FEDERAL SHARE IS  21,229,510.92, WHICH IS THE AMOUNT OF THIS AGREEMENT.THE WORK CONDUCTED UNDER THE 2008 AGREEMENT WHICH QUALIFIES FOR THIS REIMBURSEMENT INCLUDED:PIPELINESOVERHEAD POWERLINESRECHARGE RECOVERY WELLSPROCESS CONTROL AND SCADA IMPLEMENTATION
